org.apache.spark.sql.sources

接口 StreamSourceProvider


  • public interface StreamSourceProvider
    ::Experimental:: Implemented by objects that can produce a streaming Source for a specific format or system.

    从以下版本开始:
    2.0.0

    • 方法概要

      所有方法 实例方法 抽象方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      org.apache.spark.sql.execution.streaming.Source createSource(SQLContext sqlContext, String metadataPath, scala.Option<StructType> schema, String providerName, scala.collection.immutable.Map<String,String> parameters) 
      scala.Tuple2<String,StructType> sourceSchema(SQLContext sqlContext, scala.Option<StructType> schema, String providerName, scala.collection.immutable.Map<String,String> parameters)
      Returns the name and schema of the source that can be used to continually read data.
